Classes/ContainerFlowStack.html#/s:10Swi.name: registerModule(for:resolve:)
Classes/ContainerFlowStack.html#/s:10Swi.abstract: This is the registration method, it’s used for you register the View Controllers that you will use in your flow manager, the order that you declare will be used if you use the automatic navigation method.

Classes/ContainerFlowStack.html#/s:10Swi.name: registerModuleWithParameter(for:customIdentifier:resolve:)
Classes/ContainerFlowStack.html#/s:10Swi.abstract: This is the registration method for your view controller that you will receive some parameter when try to resolve, try to navigate using flow manager, you will be able to declare what you will expect as parameter, here you need to declare the type of the parameters that you will receive, and it’s mandatory if you have one or more they be in the same order as when you send the parameter.
